import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const Navbar = () => { const [menuBtn, setMenuBtn] = useState(false); const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false); const cartItems = useSelector((state)=> state) return ( <>
  • Home
  • Shop
  • About
  • Contact
  • Login
  • Signup
  • Logout
setMenuBtn(!menuBtn)} className={`${ menuBtn ? "fas fa-times" : "fas fa-bars" } text-[#ff5252] text-xl md:hidden cursor-pointer`} >
setIsActive(!isActive)} >

Total:$0

); }; export default Navbar;
